name: Dragon Farm (FumyaHero)
description:
Dragon Farm Simple Point&Click game where you can take care of different kind of dragons and grow food for them! If you want to take a break from the playing, don't worry - the game autosaves locally every time you go to sleep. (Warning! The game may load for a momment,  so stay patient if you encounter a black screen!) If you encounter any bug, please report it in the comment or on DragonFarm Discord Server - https://discord.gg/qq6x8rG (Also, refreshing the page usually fixes the bug temporary)
 Credits:

Joanna Michałek (FumyaHero)
